ComicInfo.Summary:
Music, mayhem, and most importantly: family. The TMNT all return to NYC and begin to see a path forward for themselves in Mutant Town. The conclusion to Sophie Campbell's first ongoing story arc ends with heart and isn't to be missed!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sophie Campbell | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Fahriza Kamaputra (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ramon Villalobos (a) & Rico Renzi (c) | 3 | RE | Gamers and Geek Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Tessa Rose | 4 | RE | Biloxi Anime and Comic Expo Exclusive Variant Cover | Tessa Rose | 5 | RE | Slab City Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | Emil Cabaltierra | 6 |
